Not surprising, the reunited Fleetwood Mac's music sales have surged, according to Billboard.biz. The group, with Lindsey Buckingham, Mick Fleetwood, John McVie, Christine McVie and Stevie Nicks, will kick off the “On With the Show” concert tour on Sept. 20, 2014. It’s the first time they have toured together in 16 years. Kobalt is proud to represent members Mick Fleetwood, Lindsey Buckingham and Stevie Nicks.

For the full story, check out Billboard.biz at:
